bibl.title: Magica Graeca Parvula.
bibl.note: 1. "The 365 Members" [Suppl. Mag. II, 53, 14-15]. Offers a further parallel: A. AUDOLLENT, Defixionum tabellae No. 15. - 2. An Erotic Spell from Alexandria [Suppl. Mag. II, 54, 36-39]. Revised transcription. - 3. Curse Tablets from Carthage. - 4. A Curse on the Horses and Charioteers of the Blues [S.E.G. VII, 213 (Beirut)]. Refers to P.G.M. - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: JORDAN David R., Magica Graeca Parvula.

1. "The 365 Members" [Suppl. Mag. II, 53, 14-15]. Offers a further parallel: A. AUDOLLENT, Defixionum tabellae No. 15. - 2. An Erotic Spell from Alexandria [Suppl. Mag. II, 54, 36-39]. Revised transcription. - 3. Curse Tablets from Carthage. - 4. A Curse on the Horses and Charioteers of the Blues [S.E.G. VII, 213 (Beirut)]. Refers to P.G.M. - Bibliography.
